name: Nonfatal_stroke_Comparator_Evidence_from_MAGICapp_313879

note.text: From RECODe to an estimate per 1000 patients for 5 years with the following assumption: Non-fatal MI and non-fatal stroke are equally distribute (https://sanjaybasu.shinyapps.io/recode/).
